00019 #define           INS_CMNT_FIRST_BULLET_Y                         75 + LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y

00054 BOOLEAN EnterInsuranceComments()
00055 {
00056   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00057       UINT8 i;
00058       UINT16 usPosX;
00059 
00060       InitInsuranceDefaults();
00061 
00062       // load the Insurance bullet graphic and add it
00063       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00064       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\bullet.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00065       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiInsCmntBulletImage));
00066 
00067       usPosX = INS_CMNT_FIRST_BULLET_X-6;
00068       for( i=0; i<3; i++)
00069       {
00070             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedInsuranceCommentLinkRegion[i], usPosX, INS_CMNT_LINK_Y-1, (UINT16)(usPosX + INS_CMNT_LINK_WIDTH), INS_CMNT_LINK_Y+INS_CMNT_LINK_HEIGHT+1, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00071                                CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectInsuranceCommentLinkRegionCallBack); 
00072             MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedInsuranceCommentLinkRegion[i]); 
00073             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gSelectedInsuranceCommentLinkRegion[i], 0, i );      
00074 
00075             usPosX += INS_CMNT_LINK_OFFSET_X;
00076       }
00077 
00078 
00079 
00080 
00081       RenderInsuranceComments();
00082 
00083       return(TRUE);
00084 }
00085 
00086 void ExitInsuranceComments()
00087 {
00088       UINT8 i;
00089       RemoveInsuranceDefaults();
00090       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiInsCmntBulletImage );
00091 
00092       for(i=0; i<3; i++)
00093             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedInsuranceCommentLinkRegion[i]);
00094 }

00101 void RenderInsuranceComments()
00102 {
00103 //  HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00104       wchar_t           sText[800];
00105       UINT16      usPosX, usPosY;
00106 
00107       SetFontShadow( INS_FONT_SHADOW );
00108 
00109       DisplayInsuranceDefaults();
00110 
00111       //Display the title slogan
00112       GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_COMMENTSFROM_CLIENTS, sText );
00113       DrawTextToScreen( sText, LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X, INS_CMNT_TITLE_Y, LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X-LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X, INS_FONT_BIG, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00114 
00115 
00116       usPosY = INS_CMNT_FIRST_BULLET_Y;
00117 
00118       //Display the commnet from Gus
00119       DisplayComment( INS_SNGL_GUS_TARBALLS, INS_MLTI_GUS_SPEECH, usPosY );
00120 
00121       usPosY += INS_CMNT_NEXT_COMMENT_OFFSET_Y;
00122 
00123       //Display the commnet from ali hussean
00124       DisplayComment( INS_SNGL_ALI_HUSSEAN, INS_MLTI_ALI_HUSSEAN_SPEECH, usPosY );
00125 
00126       usPosY += INS_CMNT_NEXT_COMMENT_OFFSET_Y;
00127 
00128 
00129       //Display the commnet from Lance allot
00130       DisplayComment( INS_SNGL_LANCE_ALLOT, INS_MLTI_LANCE_ALLOT_SPEECH, usPosY );
00131 
00132       usPosY += INS_CMNT_NEXT_COMMENT_OFFSET_Y;
00133 
00134       //Display the commnet from Fred Cousteau
00135       DisplayComment( INS_SNGL_FRED_COUSTEAU, INS_MLTI_FRED_COUSTEAU_SPEECH, usPosY );
00136 
00137 
00138       //Display the link text
00139       usPosX = INS_CMNT_FIRST_BULLET_X-6;
00140 
00141       //Display the first link text
00142       swprintf( sText, L"%s", pMessageStrings[ MSG_HOMEPAGE ] );
00143       DisplayWrappedString( usPosX, INS_CMNT_LINK_Y+13, INS_CMNT_LINK_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00144       //Display the red bar under the link at the bottom
00145       DisplaySmallRedLineWithShadow( usPosX, INS_CMNT_LINK_Y+INS_CMNT_LINK_HEIGHT, (UINT16)(usPosX+INS_CMNT_LINK_WIDTH), INS_CMNT_LINK_Y+INS_CMNT_LINK_HEIGHT);
00146       usPosX += INS_CMNT_LINK_OFFSET_X;
00147 
00148 
00149       //Display the third link text
00150       GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_HOW_DOES_INS_WORK, sText );
00151       DisplayWrappedString( usPosX, INS_CMNT_LINK_Y+6, INS_CMNT_LINK_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR, sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00152       //Display the red bar under the link at the bottom
00153       DisplaySmallRedLineWithShadow( usPosX, INS_CMNT_LINK_Y+INS_CMNT_LINK_HEIGHT, (UINT16)(usPosX+INS_CMNT_LINK_WIDTH), INS_CMNT_LINK_Y+INS_CMNT_LINK_HEIGHT);
00154       usPosX += INS_CMNT_LINK_OFFSET_X;
00155 
00156       //Display the fourth link text
00157       GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_TO_ENTER_REVIEW, sText );
00158       DisplayWrappedString( usPosX, INS_CMNT_LINK_Y-1, INS_CMNT_LINK_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR, sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00159       //Display the red bar under the link at the bottom
00160       DisplaySmallRedLineWithShadow( usPosX, INS_CMNT_LINK_Y+INS_CMNT_LINK_HEIGHT, (UINT16)(usPosX+INS_CMNT_LINK_WIDTH), INS_CMNT_LINK_Y+INS_CMNT_LINK_HEIGHT);
00161 
00162       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
00163   MarkButtonsDirty( );
00164       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00165   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00166 }

00168 
00169 void SelectInsuranceCommentLinkRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00170 { 
00171       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00172       {
00173       }
00174       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00175       {
00176             UINT32 uiInsuranceLink = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
00177 
00178             if( uiInsuranceLink == 0 )
00179                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE;
00180             else if( uiInsuranceLink == 1 )
00181                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE_INFO;
00182             else if( uiInsuranceLink == 2 )
00183                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE_CONTRACT;
00184       }
00185       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00186       {
00187       } 
00188 }

00191 BOOLEAN DisplayComment( UINT8 ubCommentorsName, UINT8 ubComment, UINT16 usPosY )
00192 {
00193       wchar_t           sText[800];
00194   HVOBJECT  hPixHandle;
00195       UINT16            sNumPixels=0;
00196 
00197 
00198       //Get and display the insurance bullet
00199       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiInsCmntBulletImage );
00200       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, INS_CMNT_FIRST_BULLET_X, usPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00201 
00202       //Display the commenters comment
00203       GetInsuranceText( ubComment, sText );                 //+INS_CMNT_COMMENT_OFFSET_Y
00204       sNumPixels = DisplayWrappedString( INS_CMNT_FIRST_BULLET_X+INSURANCE_BULLET_TEXT_OFFSET_X, (UINT16)(usPosY), INS_CMNT_COMMENT_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00205 
00206       //Display the red bar under the link at the bottom
00207       DisplaySmallRedLineWithShadow( INS_CMNT_FIRST_BULLET_X+INSURANCE_BULLET_TEXT_OFFSET_X, (UINT16)(usPosY+sNumPixels), INS_CMNT_FIRST_BULLET_X+INS_CMNT_REDLINE_WIDTH, (UINT16)(usPosY+sNumPixels));
00208 
00209       sNumPixels += 4;
00210 
00211       //Display the commenters name
00212       GetInsuranceText( ubCommentorsName, sText );
00213       DrawTextToScreen( sText, INS_CMNT_FIRST_BULLET_X+INSURANCE_BULLET_TEXT_OFFSET_X, (UINT16)(usPosY+sNumPixels), INS_CMNT_REDLINE_WIDTH, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED );
00214 
00215       return( TRUE );
00216 }
